text: aho ! visvasa kalavuni, (numbala ihram tattvaye sitiya di) numbalage dætata ha numbalage hi valata pahasuven hasuvana dandayam satekugen allah numbala va piriksumata lak karanu æta. eya taman idiriye nositiya di kavareku tamanta biya vanne dæ yi allah dæna ganu pinisaya. ebævin in pasuva kavareku simava ikmava katayutu kale da evita ohuta vedaniya danduvamak æta
